headline: How Investors May Respond To Cisco (CSCO) Supreme Court Appeal On Alleged Human Rights Abuses
summary: Cisco Systems is facing renewed attention after asking the U.S. Supreme Court to dismiss a lawsuit alleging its technology enabled human rights abuses against Falun Gong practitioners in China under the Alien Tort Statute and Torture Victim Protection Act. At the same time, media focus on Cisco’s record operational cycle and legal exposure is prompting investors to reassess how flat sales, pressured free cash flow margins and potential reputational risks fit with the company’s longer-term...
